showScoreExcerpt:
“After a few months in which the new musicals have seemingly suffered from pernicious anemia, Some Like It Hot finds new vigor in roaring, raucous musical comedy. An old-style show with a new-style point of view, it updates Billy Wilder's vintage film farce with a nod to today's sensibilities. And, beginning with its sweet and low-down opener, a-pass-the-booze-and-damn-the-Depression party-starter titled "What Are You Thirsty For?", audiences thirsty for a shot of pep are likely to be in heaven. It's better than vitamins.”
